Articles.Content:
Oi bois, here are some of my story ideas that i want to make.

Flat Earth Pilot, A short story about what the risks of a Flat Earther as a pilot can be. It makes some points of why the Earth is not flat.

History of Ameschland, An alternative future timeline were a new country called Ameschland appeared, that changes the world. Ameschland goes through disasterous president elections, civil wars, and history making space missions. (This is actually one of my favourite story ideas and it has been with me for around 3 years or more, i might write this story very soon)

(Here are some stories that are a part of the history of Ameschland)

   -Alexander Kerman, A story about the man who is behind the advanced technology Ameschland has.

   -Time Explorers, A group of people become the first to explore time. Parts of this story have already been published, but it is discontinued because of a lack of ideas. When i get some ideas, it will be continued again! Dont worry!

New Earth, A story about the very few survivors of a nuclear apocalypse. They recolonize the Earth.

History of Anneland, An alternative historical timeline were a new kingdom appears, this story explains my from farm, to empire theory. Just like Time Explorers, this story has been discontinued because of a lack of ideas, but it will be continued later!

 

So thats pretty all my story ideas i can think of right now, but please note these things:

I really need a big packet of ideas in order for it to continue long enough, the only story that has that is the History of Ameschland.

I do not have de bets englis, i have some problems with spelling and grammar, wich might make reading a less comfortable.

 

Wich idea is your favourite? Do you have anything to say? Tell me!
I like New Earth

8 minutes ago, Spaceception said:

I like New Earth

I also really like that idea, but i dont have a big packet of ideas for that one yet.

I think alot of people will love New Earth, so i might think of ideas.
I like flat earth pilot - I think you could have some fun with that one but I would look at it from the other perspective - what would a pilot have to do differently if the world actually was flat.

5 minutes ago, James Kerman said:

I like flat earth pilot - I think you could have some fun with that one but I would look at it from the other perspective - what would a pilot have to do differently if the world actually was flat.

I thought of that idea once too.

Flat Earth Pilot might me the easiest for me to make.

You could write that while you build outlines for your other ideas. 

There is a thread for aspiring authors here:
